mapper.insert: insert into spring_blogs (blog_no, blog_title, blog_writer, blog_content) values (spring_blog_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: select blog_no as no, user_name as userName, user_email as userEmail, user_id as userId, blog_title as title, blog_content as content, blog_writer as writer, blog_likes as likes, blog_comment_counts as commentCounts, blog_create_date as createDate from spring_blogs a, spring_users b where a.blog_writer = b.user_id order by blog_no asc
